pages.text:
You Deserve A Carefree Life
Oak Harbor is a gated community of luxury single family homes, villas, cottages and condominiums.  Located on the Indian River, near Vero Beach’s art and cultural district as well as the area’s medical corridor centered on Cleveland Clinic Indian River Hospital.  Residents at Oak Harbor enjoy luxurious green landscapes and interesting waterways.  Centered in the community is the Oak Harbor Club, a premiere country club for residents wanting to enjoy an active lifestyle of sporting amenities, as well as social clubs and events.  Amenities are available through membership in the Oak Harbor Club.
The Oak Harbor Club-
Enjoy the Best!
The Oak Harbor Club is a premier lifestyle country club specifically designed for the active lifestyle of members over  55.  The Club sits at the center of the Oak Harbor community and offers a number of sporting activities as well as a full range of social activities.  The Club’s 9 hole Joe Lee designed golf course offers members the ability for leisure play as well as competitive events, including Men’s Day, Ladies Day and our very popular Saturday Scramble.  The Club also offers leisure and club match croquet on a beautifully groomed croquet lawn.  For those wanting racquet sports, the Club offers tennis on a clay court and pickleball on a grass court.  The Club also has an active bocce league.
The intimate size of the Oak Harbor Club is one of its most distinctive qualities.  By keeping membership exclusive, the Club ensures that members can easily confirm a dinner reservation or enjoy a round of golf without needing a tee time.  The Club’s smaller size encourages frequent and meaningful social connections, making Oak Harbor more than just a place to stay active–it’s a community where friendships thrive.
Lifestyle & Activities
Extensive Sports and Social Activities
The Oak Harbor Club offers a complete array of activities for active Members and their guests.
The Club’s 9 hole Joe Lee designed golf course offers members the ability for leisure play as well as competitive events, including Men’s Day, Ladies Day and our very popular Saturday Scramble.  Golf clinics and lessons are available from the Club’s Class “A” PGA professional.
The Club’s croquet program offers individual play as well as round-robin events and interclub match play.  And they have their ever popular Wine N Wickets events.
The Club offers racquet sports of tennis on a clay court, as well as the very popular pickleball which we play on a well-maintained grass court.  The Club’s racquet sports are available for casual or competitive play.  Lesson are available on site.
There is weekly bocce drop in play as well as a bocce league during the winter season.
The Health and Wellness Center has a fitness center with classes in yoga, Qi Gong, Aquacise, Stretch & Tone as well as chair exercise classes.  There is a pool and Jacuzzi available from dawn to dusk as well as a fitness center with a full range of equipment and weights.
In the Clubhouse, you will find Monday Movie Matinee, Tuesday Trivia, Thursday Dinner with John Ryan at the piano, Friday Bingo and Dinner, as well as Lounge Happy Hour events.  Also available are Contract Bridge and Mah Jongg.  Special events are scheduled throughout the year.
Lifestyle - 
Living the Good Life
The Oak Harbor Club offers a plethora of activities including contract bridge, Mah Jongg and Book Club.  Tech Savy classes and movie events are offered on a weekly basis.  Members have the ability to structure their days to their liking.  The days can include sports activities or individual fitness time. Our extensive library has the latest periodicals and books for our Members’ enjoyment. Meeting up with other members at the Clubhouse Lounge for a cocktail before dinner or for a night of Trivia are Member favorites. It is said that the only time you retire at Oak Harbor is when you retire to your bed at night.
The 42,000 square foot clubhouse transports its members to elegant dining and social events.  The Clubhouse hosts both casual and more formal dining for our Members’ enjoyment.  It also houses the Club’s fitness center, pool and Jacuzzi.  Meeting rooms are available for many social amenities, including bridge and Mah Jongg.
Also located inside the Club’s massive Clubhouse is the Oak Harbor Fitness Center outfitted with state-of-the-art equipment for group and individual training.
The Clubhouse is also where you will find Oak Harbor Home Health.  For members who desire additional assistance with their daily health challenges, Oak Harbor Home Health is here to provide Members with a full array of services that allow our Members to remain in their homes while receiving care.
From the 9 hole, Joe Lee designed golf course, croquet, impressive Galas, and the exquisite cuisine, this is a way of life like no other. Our nationally recognized Wellness Program recently expanded to include concierge-like services from our in-house health services team. Oak Harbor Club offers three membership choices to fit the individual needs of our members.
For Your
Dining Pleasure
The Club’s impressive 42,000 square foot Clubhouse offers choices for your dining pleasure.  The formal dining room offers creative chef-prepared menus.  Or for a less formal evening, Members enjoy the Sunroom which offers a selection of lighter fare.  The Club also has a private dining room where Members can arrange for smaller gatherings for family or special dinners with friends.
Health & Wellness Geared To Your Specific Needs
The focus of the Club’s Wellness Program is to enhance the overall quality of daily life for our members by gently supervising Members to achieve their optimal level of physical fitness.  The Club’s philosophy is a gradual, yet continuous dedication to increasing your levels of stability, coordination, flexibility and muscular strength.
The Club’s unique Health and Wellness Center is staffed by an on-site nursing staff who assists and advises Members with various medical matters including designing the proper home health care program when needed.  The care provided through the Oak Harbor Home Health allows Members’ families to know that their family member is receiving the best care in their own home.
Members needing a more concentrated level of care can make arrangements through the Club’s Health and Wellness Center to enter Somerset House for short or long-term rehabilitation or for continuing assisted living.
The facilities and services offered through the Club’s Health and Wellness Center provide a point of difference at Oak Harbor Club.  This amenity is one of the ways that the Oak Harbor Club keeps its Members’ needs as a central focus of the Club.
Services
Companion care
Collect newspapers/mail
Personal shopping
Local doctor appointments
Nurse visits (RN/LPN)
In home care by a Home Health Aide (“HHA”) or a Certified Nurses Assistant (“CNA”)
Medication management
Blood pressure and vitals readings on a periodic basis (daily, weekly, or monthly)
Respite care
Hospital and rehab stay companion
Memberships
At Oak Harbor Club our memberships are designed to allow the member to select the amenities that most appeal to their desires.  Three different membership plans are available:  Country Club, Associate, and House.  The selection runs from unlimited golf to enjoying the social aspects of the Club.  All of the memberships provide for full use of the gorgeous Clubhouse and its dining facilities as well as the Club fitness, health and social programs.
All Memberships provide for participation in the Oak Harbor Home Health as well as entrance to Somerset House on a priority basis, if needed.
A personal meeting with the Membership Director will provide you with a private tour of the Club and allow you to review the three membership levels so that you can design a program that best meets your lifestyle and individual needs.
Real Estate
Our exceptional collection of homes blends timeless architectural style with uncompromising luxury and convenience. Oak Harbor’s superb lifestyle choices include elegant cottages, gracious condominiums, and grand villas offering scenic views of lakes, the golf course, and serene wildlife estuaries.
Listings

Enter Phone Number
Message
